item.title: Apple Watch Series 11 Review: Finally, the Watch Lives Longer
item.description: Every year, I say you probably don’t need to upgrade if you already own a recent Apple Watch. This year is the exception.

item.title: Apple Watch Series 11 Review: Finally, the Watch Lives Longer
item.description: Every year, I say you probably don’t need to upgrade if you already own a recent Apple Watch. This year is the exception.

item.title: The Top New Features in Apple WatchOS 26
item.description: Apple’s new additions this year include a wrist-flick gesture to dismiss a call and a personalized Workout Buddy to tell you when you “crushed it.”

item.title: The Top New Features in Apple WatchOS 26
item.description: Apple’s new additions this year include a wrist-flick gesture to dismiss a call and a personalized Workout Buddy to tell you when you “crushed it.”

item.title: The Fitbit App Is Turning Into an AI-Powered Personal Health Coach
item.description: Built with Gemini, Google’s AI health coach will be everything but a doctor.

item.description: Built with Gemini, Google’s AI health coach will be everything but a doctor.

item.title: An Exclusive Look at Reliability Labs, Where Google Stress Tests Pixel Hardware
item.description: Google runs an array of tests on its Pixel phones and smartwatches throughout the development cycle. Here’s a peek behind the curtain of what that testing looks like.

item.title: 10 Crazy Features Powering Google's Pixel 10 Phones (and Watch)
item.description: Google’s latest AI features include real-time translated phone calls in your own AI-generated voice, an AI camera coach that makes you a better Instagram husband, and a voicemail replacement.

item.title: 10 Crazy Features Powering Google's Pixel 10 Phones (and Watch)
item.description: Google’s latest AI features include real-time translated phone calls in your own AI-generated voice, an AI camera coach that makes you a better Instagram husband, and a voicemail replacement.

item.title: Exclusive: Google Pixel Watch 4 Teardown Shows Easy Repairability
item.description: Watch our exclusive teardown of the Pixel Watch 4 to see just how easy it is to remove the battery and display on Google’s latest smartwatch.

item.title: Google Pixel 10 Series, Pixel Watch 4, Pixel Buds 2a: Specs, Features, Release Date
item.description: The Pixel 10 series is here. These are the first official flagship Android phones with magnetic Qi2 wireless charging. Also in tow are the Pixel Watch 4 and Pixel Buds 2a earbuds.

item.title: Google Pixel 10 Series, Pixel Watch 4, Pixel Buds 2a: Specs, Features, Release Date
item.description: The Pixel 10 series is here. These are the first official flagship Android phones with magnetic Qi2 wireless charging. Also in tow are the Pixel Watch 4 and Pixel Buds 2a earbuds.

item.title: The Apple Watch Is Finally Getting Blood Oxygen Sensing Back
item.description: The feature was removed on select smartwatches due to a patent-infringement lawsuit, but Apple has “redesigned” it.

item.description: These WIRED-tested wearables reduce your reliance on a phone while keeping you connected.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch8 and Watch8 Classic Review: The Squircle
item.description: Samsung introduces a ton of new health-tracking features, some of which are a little strange.
